description:
APPLICATION FOR A LAWFUL DEVELOPMENT CERTIFICATE IN RESPECT OF THE PROPOSED LOFT CONVERSION AND ERECTION OF A REAR DORMER WINDOWS EXTENSIONS ON THE MAIN ROOF AND OUTRIGGER ROOF 
WITH 3 ROOFLIGHTS IN THE FRONT ROOF SLOPE.
decision_conditions:
Condition : 1 - Approved Plans - The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans: Drawing no: 2025 OS 100042766 (Site Location Plan) Dated 05th February 2025  
Drawing no: TOROM25036101334542(Proposed Block Plan) Dated 5th February 2025
Drawing no: norr-34-1/ revised (Existing Front Elevation Plan, Existing Side Elevations Plan and Existing Rear Elevation Plan) Dated 09:12:2024. 
Drawing no: norr-34-2/ Revised (Proposed Front Elevation Plan, Proposed Side Elevation Plan, Proposed Side Elevation Plan And Proposed Rear Elevation Plan) Dated 09:12:2024 
Drawing no: norr-34-4/Revised (Existing Ground Floor Plan, Existing First Floor Plan, & Proposed Ground Floor Plan, Proposed First Floor Plan, Proposed Second Floor Plan, & Proposed Second Floor Structural Plan & Proposed Section Through Roof Ceiling Lowered Plan) Dated 09:12:2024
Site Photographs Received on 1st April 2025

Condition : 2 - The operations would consist of the enlargement of a dwelling house within the meaning of Class B of Part 1 of Schedule 2 to the Town & Country Planning (General Permitted Development)  (England) Order 2015 "the Order" and would comply with the development tolerances set out in said Class B. The operation would therefore have been granted planning permission by Article 3 of the Order.

Condition : 3 - The operations would consist of any other alteration to the roof of the dwelling house within the meaning of Class C of Part 1 of Schedule 2 to the Town & Country Planning (General Permitted Development)  (England) Order 2015 "the Order" and would comply with the development tolerances set out in said Class C. The operation would therefore have been granted planning permission by Article 3 of the Order.

Condition : 4 - The development is only just within Permitted Development tolerances in terms of volume. You are advised to complete the development in full accordance with the plans, as if the development is larger than that covered by this Certificate a breach of planning control could result.

Condition : 5 - INFORMATIVE (Party Wall Act) - The applicant is advised to check the requirements of the Party Wall Act 1996 relating to work on an existing wall shared with another property, building on the boundary with a neighbouring property, or excavating near a neighbouring building. Further information is available at the following link: 
https://www.gov.uk/party-walls-building-works

Condition : 6 - INFORMATIVE
Note to Applicant -Approved Schemes
In accordance with paragraph 38 of the National Planning Policy Framework, London Borough of Merton (LBM) takes a positive and proactive approach to the delivery of sustainable development, by:
1. Providing a formal pre-application advice service, details to be found on Planning pre-application advice service on LBM's website
2. Providing written policies and guidance, which is available to view on LBM's website.
3. Where appropriate, negotiating amendments to secure a positive decision.
4. Determining applications in a timely manner including providing a fast track service, details to be found on Get a quicker planning decision on LBM's website.

In this instance:
i) The application was acceptable as submitted, with Amended Plans and approved without delay .
